body: So this week and the one before this 1, Ive been in this kind of mini-vacations, they first started in a cruise were I met many people (A LOT!), from my continent, South America, and I'm in Miami now, its my 2nd time here and people has been very nice, Im staying at a resort called Marenas.. <3

title: My Mini-Vacations

replies.body: Lucky! Where are you going next?
replies.body_tagged: Lucky! Where are you going next?

replies.body: To my country, Chile, cause its only 2 weeks, thats why they are mini.. :P
